content: I'm trying to fill out the pre-connectathon survey, and am stuck on page 2. Question 12 is marked mandatory, but does not have any input. Because of this, I cannot actually complete the survey. image.png

Gino Canessa said:

I'm trying to fill out the pre-connectathon survey, and am stuck on page 2. Question 12 is marked mandatory, but does not have any input. Because of this, I cannot actually complete the survey. image.png

Hi Gino - I was not able to replicate the problem but I do have your track selection as Subscriptions and SMART App Launch so you should be good to go.
Odd, tried in several browsers. I guess if it's working :shrug: . Thanks!
@Gino Canessa , did this end up working for you?
Nope, but it appears to have collected the first page fine.
Interesting, what platform are you on? Sandy forwarded it around last night to see if any of us could reproduce.
